ModMetaData.name: NW Sterile Wall R1.1
ModMetaData.author: WNik, Updated by Ogliss
ModMetaData.description:
update to R1.0 original mod:https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=933535548
Adds walls to the game that fit nicely with sterile floors.
this is Not my own work, this is just an update to make it compatible with R1.0
